description: This file defines a React-like component named 'RecipeCard' using the LightningJS framework. It renders a container with a background and a title text, intended to be used as a UI element in a recipe browsing application.

classes.name: RecipeCard
classes.description: A component that displays a styled card with a recipe title.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the component with properties and template.
